[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.
[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO When "The Only Lie" is placed in your Climax Zone, if you have 2 or more other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains the following two abilities for the turn. "[A] [(1)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step." "[A] At the end of this card's attack, reveal the top card of your Library, choose a Level X or lower Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand. X = Level of the revealed card." (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[C] This cannot be chosen as target of Opponent's effects.
[A] CX COMBO [(4) Put 4 other Characters from your Stage in the Waiting Room] When "Memories of the Quintuplets" is placed in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, choose up to 5 of this card's Markers and put them in separate Slots on the Stage, then Send this to Memory.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn. Choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room with "Irreplaceable Bond" in name, then if there are a total of 4 or fewer cards between your Memory and Marker Zones and if there isn't a Marker under this with the same name as the chosen card, put the chosen card face-up under this as Marker.

[C] ASSIST During your turn, all your Level 0 or lower Characters in front of this gain +1000 Power.
[S] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] Look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Quintuplets:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, put the rest in the Waiting Room, and if you have another ::Quintuplets:: Character, choose up to 1 "Yotsuba Nakano, Something She Wants" in your Waiting Room and Send it to Memory.

[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may move this to an empty Front Row Center Slot.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from top of your Library. If you reveal at least 1 card this way, choose up to 1 Character with "Ichika" in name among them, put it in your hand, put the rest in the Waiting Room, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[A] CHANGE [Put this in the Waiting Room] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose an "Ichika Nakano, Sudden Answer" in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in.
[A] CHANGE [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] At the start of your Climax Phase, if you are Level 2 or higher, you may pay cost. If so, choose an "Ichika Nakano, Something She Can Do as Big Sis" in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in.

[C] If "Ichika Nakano, Pure White Wish" is in your Clock, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Growing Love" is in the Climax Zone and you have 4 or more other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, search your Library for up to 2 ::Quintuplets:: Characters, reveal them, choose 1 of them and put it in your hand, put the rest in Stock, shuffle your Library, and this gains +3000 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1)] When Character Opposite this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 2 of them and put them in the Waiting Room, and put the rest on top of your Library in any order.

[C] RECOLLECTION If there are 3 or more ::Quintuplets:: Characters in your Memory, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and Send it to Memory, and your Opponent puts that Character from Memory in any Slot on their Stage.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Quintuplets:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[C] If this is in the Front Row Center Slot, this gains +1 Soul.
[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[C] During your turn, for each of your other Characters with "Ichika" in name, this gains +1000 Power.

[A] [(1)] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have 5 or more Characters with "Yotsuba" in name, you may pay cost. If so, return all cards in your Waiting Room to your Library, and shuffle your Library.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1500, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax card with a Choice Trigger Icon, if there's no Marker under this, you may choose a ::Quintuplets:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it face-down under this as Marker.
[S] [Put a Marker from under this in the Waiting Room] Choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and Send it to Memory, and at the start of the Encore Step, your Opponent puts that Character from Memory in any Slot on their Stage.

[A] [Clock] ALARM If this is on top of the Clock, at the start of your Main Phase, you may draw a card. If so, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.
[A] [Clock] ALARM If this is on top of the Clock and you have 3 or more ::Quintuplets:: Characters, at the start of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] [Put this in the Waiting Room] When your other ::Quintuplets:: Character is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, if this is in the Back Row, you may pay cost. If so, put that Character Rested in the Slot it was in.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Quintuplets:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn, and if that Character is "Ichika Nakano, Yukata Look", that Character also gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room."

[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, reveal the top card of your Library, choose a Level X or lower Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand. X = Level of the revealed card. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)
[A] RECOLLECTION When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if there's a card in your Memory, choose 1 of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, and that Character gains +3000 Power for the turn.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] This ability activates up to 3 times per turn. When your other Character is placed from the Waiting Room to the Stage, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1 Soul for the turn.

[C] All your other Characters with "Irreplaceable Bond" in name gain +1500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO RECOLLECTION At the start of your Attack Phase, if "Memories of the Quintuplets" is in the Climax Zone and "Futaro Uesugi, Teacher for the Quintuplets" is in your Memory, put up to 2 cards from top of your Library in Stock, your Opponent chooses a Climax card in his or her Waiting Room, returns all cards in that Waiting Room except the chosen card to the Library, and shuffles that Library.

If you don't have a Character with "Ichika" in name, you cannot play this from hand.
Look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your Characters with "Ichika" in name + 1.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters.
[A] [(1)] During your Opponent's turn, when this becomes Reversed in battle, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this, and at the start of your next Encore Step, Send this to Memory.

[A] [(2) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] At the end of this card's attack, you may pay cost. If so, put the bottom 5 cards of your Opponent's Library in the Waiting Room, deal X Damage to your Opponent, and this gains +1000 Power until the next end of your Opponent's turn. X = # of Climax cards among them. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] CX COMBO RECOLLECTION When "Leaping Over the World" is placed in your Climax Zone, if you are Level 3 or higher and this is in Memory, you may put this in any Slot in the Front Row.

"[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and that Character does not Reverse for the turn."
